item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: RHEL Software Reservations Now Available on Azure with Updated Pricing
item.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) software reservations are Generally Available on Azure again after updates to billing meters and pricing that resolve prior billing issues and align charges with Red Hat’s new pricing.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Product-specific billing APIs are closing down
item.description:
GitHub is closing down the remaining product-specific billing APIs for Actions, Packages, and shared storage, following earlier notices about Actions workflow usage endpoints.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Visualize GitHub Enterprise metered usage by organization
item.description:
Beginning October 1, 2025, GitHub Enterprise Cloud metered usage will show which organization is billed for each GHEC license, allowing enterprise owners and billing managers to visualize usage by organization.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Upcoming removal of Copilot premium request $0 budgets for enterprise and team accounts
item.description:
Starting November 18, 2025, GitHub will remove all $0 Copilot premium request budgets for enterprise and team accounts that were created before August 22, 2025.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Updating license-based budgets to accept license counts
item.description:
GitHub updated license-based budgets so they now use license counts instead of dollar amounts, simplifying management for enterprise and organization licenses.

  • Source: GitHub
